item.title: send notification when task finish
item.description: 终端里运行长时间任务(比如 make systemimage)的时候经常会切换到其他环境做别的事情 容易忘记查看之前的任务是否完成, 查到一些方法用在任务结束时发出通知 #C-z 切到后台运行 fg; tput bel # Mac OS X #系统弹窗 osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to display alert "Build Completed" message "The checkout and build have completed."' say "Job finished" #语音播报 #notification center osascript -e 'display notification "Job finished" with title "Alert"' sudo gem install terminal-notifier terminal-notifier -message "Job finished!" -title "Alert" # Ubuntu notify-send "Job finished!" # KDE kdialog --passivepopup 'Job finished' 还有 iterm2 trigger 也能用来触发通知, 高亮文字
